title: Paths Through the Verdant Decay
goal: Establish the journey through increasingly blighted lands, allowing Eldrin to attune his senses and Lyra to adapt to their new purpose.
stakes_shift: The journey reveals the blight's insidious reach is far wider and more deeply embedded than initially perceived, impacting the very essence of the land.

bridge.from_prev: Eldrin and Lyra have committed to a journey to seek answers about the blight.
bridge.to_next: The journey leads them to an unexpected encounter, complicating their path.

sections.title: The Blight's Embrace
sections.intent: Show the journey through increasingly corrupted natural landscapes.

scenes.summary: Eldrin and Lyra traverse forests where vibrant life gives way to unnatural stillness, the air thick with a subtle, cloying decay.
scenes.outcome: Their journey takes them deeper into regions visibly affected by the Shadow Blight.

sections.title: Senses Awakened
sections.intent: Eldrin begins to attune his ancient senses to the new manifestation of the blight.

scenes.summary: Eldrin focuses, sensing the blight's patterns and subtle energy drains, his ancient connection to the land slowly reawakening.
scenes.outcome: Eldrin's magical senses begin to attune to the specific energies of the Shadow Blight.

sections.title: Lyra's Adaptation
sections.intent: Show Lyra's growing acceptance and her practical skills becoming invaluable.

scenes.summary: Lyra, utilizing her tracking skills, navigates treacherous paths, her pragmatism a stark contrast to Eldrin's ancient wisdom.
scenes.outcome: Lyra proves her invaluable worth as a guide and protector, solidifying her role.
